message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe has immense potential value. While I can't disclose specifics about the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it could be even more valuable for the right person. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. This is a chance to acquire something truly special. Please let me know your decision.
